title: Local Kung Fu 3
overview: Fresh of earning his yellow belt, a wannabe don Bonzo, is humiliated when two skilled brothers cut his hair during a fight. Seeking revenge, he turns to Dulu and Tansen for help. As tension rises, Dulu and Tansen manage to knock out one of the brothers. The story culminates in a dramatic showdown, where honor, identity, and redemption are fiercely fought over.
